segments.text: This kitchen scene is oddly captivating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult is drying dishes, towel bunched up around the plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Unbelievable, the faucet's on and the sink's overflowing massively.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water everywhere, ruining the floor and cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's got her foot in the puddle, still clueless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are at the cabinet, cookie jar wide open.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy's on that unstable stool, about to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's pulling out cookies like it's a game.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl's reaching for hers, so expectant.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: All this water waste is just gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a tidy garden, fresh and clean.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the kids might get caught soon.
segments.speaker: PAR
